Package com.accele.gage.config

Class GameConfigurationWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.accele.gage.config.GameConfigurationWriter
  • public class GameConfigurationWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple GameConfiguration writer that writes engine properties to an external destination.

    This writer will export all engine properties from the GameConfiguration. An instance of this class can be created at any point after calling the init(int, int, String) method and can be called at any point after initialization.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    William Garland

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameConfigurationWriter​(Resource<java.io.OutputStream> out)
      Creates a new GameConfigurationWriter which will write engine properties to the specified external destination.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Retrieves game configuration properties from the GameConfiguration and writes them to the specified external destination.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public void write()
           throws GAGEException
        Retrieves game configuration properties from the GameConfiguration and writes them to the specified external destination.

        An instance of this class can be created at any point after calling the init(int, int, String) method and can be called at any point after initialization.

        Throws:
        GAGEException - if the writer fails to write the properties to the external destination
